ComicInfo.Summary:
Justice, severely beaten and possibly dying, arrives at a hospital, where he tells SuperPatriot that Liberty is held captive the the Covenant of the Sword, who are building their own 'master race.'
SuperPatriot decides to fry Darklord while he's still a child, before the tyke can grow up to become the murderous dictator of all of Earth. To make things much, much worse, Darklord is his grandson.
